thread.section_title: MiniInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 MiniInTheBox 的点评意见 | miniinthebox.com | 435 3
thread.title: Apu

author: Apu
title: Apu
text:
The (free) delivery takes some time because it uses the regular mail. Usually the order arrives in 3-5 weeks. In EU, if the order remains under 22 euros there are no extra customs duties to be paid and the order arrives directly to your mailbox.
The contents of orders are precisely as adverticed and in the (rare) cases with problems with the delivery or the product the MiniInTheBox customer service has always resolved the case promptly to my satisfaction.
I can recommend the site without hesitation. Just keep in mind the delivery time and remember that the quality of products might not be the best absolute but usually it is very good for the price paid.
